Termitron::
"She's avenged..!!! She's avenged!!!!"cried Termitron "The bird-bot 
and aero-bot were fighting against colony's enemies out side while 
Betrayal-old-bot attemped kill her, Your Majesty was defenless 'cause 
bretayal-old-bot shot her before!!!! I liked kill him but, Areo-bot 
wanted a trial to Betrayal-old-bot, he locked him down but BEtrayal-
old bot ran away and killed her, he said "She's dead"... I killed 
him... She was a young queen, she couldn't fight so good and in spite 
that she risked her life in the first New-colony fight... and she's 
dead.... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Lynxiz::
> "I... I'm sorry to hear that," replies Lynxiz softly, "Who is the 
> Queen?" Then thoughtfully, "The Queen must be your leader... you 
> should find allies and avenge your Queen's death."
>
